title: 1.5 GB at night
info: 1.5 GB of Internet for 7 nights at the price of 50 Afghanis. It can be used only from 11 pm to 7 am. To activate A SML and to deactivate D SML, send it to 740.

title: 3 GB nightly
info: 3 GB Internet for 30 nights at the price of 90 Afghanis. It can be used only from 11 pm to 7 am. To activate A MDM and to deactivate D MDM, send it to 740.

title: 7GB nightly
info: 7 GB of Internet for 30 nights at the price of 200 Afghanis. It can be used only from 11 pm to 7 am. To activate A LRG and to deactivate D LRG, send it to 740.

title: 13 GB night mix
info: 13 GB of Internet for 30 nights at the price of 350 Afghanis. It includes 200 minutes of calls. It can be used only from 11:00 PM to 7:00 AM. To activate A XTR and to deactivate D XTR, send it to 740  .
